mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Post (post_id, title, content, member_id, marketing, plan, design, front, server, refLink, process, rdate) VALUES (postSeq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{memberId}, #{marketing}, #{plan}, #{design}, #{front}, #{server}, null, 0, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE Post SET title = #{title}, member_id = #{memberId}, marketing = #{marketing}, plan = #{plan}, design = #{design}, front = #{front}, server = #{server}, refLink = #{refLink}, process = #{process} WHERE post_id = #{postId}
